+package sun.net.httpserver;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.io.InputStream;
+
+/**
+ * A class which allows the caller to read the underlying stream for an upgrade request.
+ * close() does not close the underlying stream
+ */
+class UpgradeInputStream extends LeftOverInputStream {
+
+    UpgradeInputStream(ExchangeImpl t, InputStream src) {
+        super(t, src);
+    }
+
+    @Override
+    protected int readImpl(byte[] b, int off, int len) throws IOException {
+        if (eof) {
+            return -1;
@@ -2,0 +46,1 @@
+                }
